src:
ＮＹダウ終値、３０１ドル高…雇用統計好調で３か月ぶり高値

01 Nov 2019, 21:04

　【ニューヨーク＝小林泰明】１日のニューヨーク株式市場は、１０月の米雇用統計が市場予想を上回る好調な結果だったことなどが好感され、買い注文が優勢だった。ダウ平均株価（３０種）の終値は前日比３０１・１３ドル高の２万７３４７・３６ドルで、約３か月ぶりの高値水準となった。
　米国の景気に対する安心感が広がったほか、米中貿易摩擦の緩和に向け、両政府の貿易協議が順調に進んでいるとの見方も相場を支えた。
　情報技術（ＩＴ）企業の銘柄が多いナスダック店頭市場の総合指数の終値は、９４・０４ポイント高の８３８６・４０だった。
text:
NY Dow closing price, $ 301 high ... High in employment statistics, high for the first time in 3 months

01 Nov 2019, 21:04

[New York = Yasuaki Kobayashi] In the New York Stock Market on the 1st, buying orders were dominant because the US employment statistics in October were better than expected. The closing price of the Dow average stock price (30 types) was $ 27,347.36, a rise of $ 301.13 from the previous day, the highest price in about three months.
¡In addition to the increased sense of security about the US economy, the view that the trade talks between the two governments are proceeding smoothly to ease trade disputes between the US and China also supported the market.
The closing price of the overall index of the Nasdaq over-the-counter market, which has many brands of information technology (IT) companies, was 9386.40, which was 94.04 points higher.
